description: Calling native code from managed .NET code to access OS APIs, hardware, or existing C/C++ libraries. Platform Invoke (P/Invoke) uses `DllImport` to call native functions; COM interop enables interaction with COM components. Use `LibraryImport` (source-generated) in .NET 7+ for better performance and trimming support.
shortDescription: Call native C/C++ code with P/Invoke and COM interop.
